nodes.text: Nydaks also known as Lesser Nydaks, were a predatory species from the planet Dathomir. Carnivorous and highly aggressive, nydaks could easily traverse the terrain of Dathomir using their powerful arms. The many lesser nydaks were dominated by the Nydak Alpha, a subspecies larger and stronger than then the rest of their species.

The nydak was a species of semi-bipedal apex predators from the planet Dathomir. Members of the species had black eyes, and blue and light brown skin covered in spikes, and two large tusks on either side of their mouth. Their powerful forearms allowed them to climb and traverse across rough terrain. On their hands were long, sharp claws. The Nydak Alpha, a subspecies, was larger and more dominant than their lesser counterparts.

On Dathomir, nydaks were an apex predator. Being carnivorous and highly aggressive, they would often use their agility to ambush their prey. The species had no natural predators other than the chirodactyl Gorgara.
Nydaks were a solitary species, and would rarely be found in packs after adolescence.

In local legends, the species was known as the "scourge of Dathomir," and was greatly feared by the Nightbrothers. However, according to other local legends, several Nightsisters kept them as familiars.

In 14 BBY, Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis encountered several nydaks while visiting Dathomir. One of them was being kept in a pit, where rogue Nightbrothers were thrown by other Nightbrothers, as an example to be killed and eaten by the beast.
Nydaks appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order.
